ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR(AND( NOT(ISNEW()), OR( ISCHANGED(Project__c ) , ISCHANGED( AccountId ) ) , $Profile.Name <> 'System Administrator' ), AND( PRIORVALUE(Reason_for_lost__c) <> NULL , ISCHANGED(Reason_for_lost__c) ,ISPICKVAL( StageName , 'Closed Lost'), $Profile.Name <> 'System Administrator' ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You do not have Sufficient Access
